# General Code Review Standards

## Style Guide
*   **Indentation:** Use 4 spaces for indentation.
*   **Line Length:** Limit lines to 120 characters.
*   **Comments:** Add inline comments only where necessary to clarify complex logic.
*   **Variable Naming:** Use clear, descriptive variable names.
*   **File Organization:** One class per file, organized into appropriate folders by feature or layer.

## Testing Standards
*   **Frameworks:** All tests must be written in Pytest or Bash (Under CI folder)
